queries.question: What is your return policy?
answers: Our return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase.
Returns are accepted with a valid reason within 14 days.
You can return items within 45 days for a full refund.
Our return policy varies by product, please check the product page for details.
Returns are not accepted unless the product is damaged or defective.

queries.question: How can I track my order?
answers: You can track your order by logging into your account.
Use the order tracking feature on our website.
Enter your order number on the 'Track Order' page for real-time updates.
We will send you tracking information via email once your order ships.
Tracking information is available in your order confirmation email.
